title: The Klein Law Firm Reminds Investors of an Investigation of Wynn Resorts, Limitedâ€™s (WYNN) Board in Connection With Reports of Sexual Misconduct by the CEO
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Klein Law Firm announces the commencement of an investigation of Wynn Resorts, Limited (Nasdaq:WYNN) concerning possible violations of federal securities laws.
If you suffered a loss in Wynn Resorts and wish to obtain additional information, please contact Joseph Klein, Esq. by telephone at 212-616-4899 or visit http://www.kkclasslaw.com/WYNN-Info-Request-Form-255 .
Joseph Klein, Esq. represents investors and participates in securities litigations involving financial fraud throughout the nation. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes.
